review: So far the Fire TV Stick is as advertised and everything I hoped it would be. I would have given it 5 stars if it had included better documentation and/or tutorial, reference the necessity to download apps for such things as Netflix; my sister hooked it up while I was at work and she is still of the flip phone generation. But it works great and so far is another marvel of technology well executed.

review: Absolutely LOVE the Fire Stick (and Fire TV).  It is handy to carry around and plug-in when traveling.  I do wish that you didn't have to carry the electric adapter and wish this was somehow able to hold a charge of some sort, but maybe a future model with have a small battery.  But overall, it gets the job done and I love it!
